PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-10802010-08-23EC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectRenewable Fuels Regulations
PrecisRENEWABLE FUELS REGULATIONS in order to reduce Greenhouse gases (GHG) emissions by mandating an average five percent renewable fuel content based on the gasoline volume, thereby contributing towards the protection of Canadians and the environment from the impacts of climate change. The proposed Regulations are estimated to result in an incremental reduction of GHG emissions of about one Mt CO2e per year over and above the reductions attributable to existing provincial requirements already in place. The propsed Regulations fulfill the commitments under the Renewable Fuels Strategy of reducing GHG emissions from liquid petroleum fuels and create a demand for renewable fuels in Canada.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0189 Publication Date: 2010-09-01
